title: Client won't open
body: I've tried to open my client for like 20 minutes and so far nothing pops up. I've redownloaded it and for some reason it just won't open.  I was playing just last night and everything was fine. Nothing's been downloaded, updated, etc.. It's very annoying to say the least lol

replies.body:
If you're talking about the PVP.net Patcher Kernal has stopped working" error message whenever you try to open the game, then I am also having this issue. It worked fine last night.

**EDIT: **
Actually just fixed my issue by going into the League of Legends folder on my computer and starting it through the lol.launcher.admin EXE instead.
I just started having the same issue; except I've always ran it from the lol.launcher.admin so now I'm stuck on everything besides re-downloading again :(

i would love to have my login issues fixed as well because i know it isnt on my end because everything works except league and if a riot person could actually be useful instead of just refering us to their shitty knowledge base article that does nothing for anyone

You may want to try the steps in this Knowledge Base Article:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/28732434-Patching-Issues

There are quite a lot of different steps in this article, but they do resolve the vast majority of issues with patching.  Make sure that you attempt to complete every single one!

If you still can't find the glorious orange "LAUNCH" button at the top of your patcher, don't hesitate to [submit us a new request](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/tickets/new)!  We can investigate more in-depth as to the patching issue and provide some further steps!  Just make sure to include the following:

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3
My  launcher wasn't working and i got it to work by first opening up the lol.launcher.admin like Phlecs said now it works fine
Same problem with me i would love some help
